CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Add to Cart stage positioned above or below the Leave Product Review stage?
SRP.A: The Add to Cart stage is positioned {above} the Leave Product Review stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Enter Payment Information?
VE.A: The value of stage Enter Payment Information is {4982}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initiate Checkout?
VE.A: The value of stage Initiate Checkout is {9685}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Cart?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Cart is {15364}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Add to Cart, with a value of {15364}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Leave Product Review, with a value of {4255}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {103} Users from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 7333? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Add to Cart} stage has {15364}, the {Initiate Checkout} stage has {9685}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 4930? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete Purchase} stage has {4879}, the {Leave Product Review} stage has {4255}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 4567 and 12524? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initiate Checkout} stage has {9685}, the {Enter Payment Information} stage has {4982}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {4879}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete Purchase to Leave Product Review, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Complete Purchase} to {Leave Product Review} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Complete Purchase to Leave Product Review, from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initiate Checkout} to stage {Enter Payment Information} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Add to Cart} and {Initiate Checkout} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Enter Payment Information} and {Complete Purchase} stages.
